Cartesian Transfer Operator Numerical Routines

The routines that perform spatial refining/coarsening on standard patch data types in Cartesian geometry are located in the directory SAMRAI/source/geometry/cartesian/operators/fortran. These routines are written in FORTRAN 77 and are invoked from the appropriate operator classes.
Generated on Thu Jun 18 11:28:17 2009 for SAMRAI by  1.5.1
